dcterms:creator: Matthias Plappert
Christian Mandery
Tamim Asfour
dcterms:description: The KIT dataset contains 3,911 motions and their corresponding 6,363 natural language descriptions, used for evaluating text-driven motion generation.
dcterms:title: KIT

dcterms:creator: Chuan Guo

dcterms:description: HumanML3D is a large 3D human motion dataset comprising the HumanAct12 and AMASS datasets, containing 14,616 motions and 44,970 descriptions, used for generating diverse and natural 3D human motions from text.
dcterms:title: HumanML3D
